name: Suno AI
about: An AI platform that turns text prompts into full-length songs with vocals, lyrics, and instrumentation.
summary: Generate complete songs instantly using text prompts.
details: Suno AI enables anyone to create professional-quality music by simply describing the sound they want. It handles composition, lyrics, vocals, and mixing automatically.
howTo: Go to Sunoâ€™s website and sign in.
Type a description like 'a chill pop song about friendship'.
Wait for the AI to compose and sing your song.
Download or remix the generated track.
